message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $13,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, given your needs.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $10,000?

I understand your position, Bob.  While $13,000 represents a fair price for the value this product offers, I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This feels like a good compromise that acknowledges its worth to both of us.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
